long_description: With this easy access pouch you can stash your MP3, keys, phone, cash and energy gel for running, walking or everyday activities. Lightweight pouch won't bounce, and the two roomy moisture-resistant, wide-opening compartments hold your small essentials. Venting AirFlow hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between you and back of waist pack. Slides onto any standard waistband or belt for storage and quick-and-access while on the move. Closes securely with rip-and-stick tab.
short_description: With this easy access pouch you can stash your MP3, keys, phone, cash and energy gel for running, walking or everyday activities.
